title: {websiteName} Blog
subtitle: Explore insights and updates on archaeological data management

blogs.title: Introducing {websiteName}'s CIDOC-CRM Integration
blogs.excerpt: {websiteName} now maps data to CIDOC-CRM standards, ensuring interoperability. This feature streamlines sharing of archaeological records globally. Researchers can access unified datasets effortlessly. Our open-source platform supports seamless integration. Learn how to leverage this tool today.

blogs.title: FAIR Principles in {websiteName}
blogs.excerpt: {websiteName} adheres to FAIR principles for data management. Our platform makes research findable, accessible, interoperable, and reusable. Users benefit from open licenses and metadata. This approach fosters global collaboration. Discover FAIR-compliant tools now.

blogs.title: Custom Forms in {websiteName}
blogs.excerpt: {websiteName} offers customizable forms for data entry. Researchers can tailor fields to specific archaeological needs. This flexibility enhances data accuracy. The platform supports collaborative editing. Start creating your forms today.

blogs.title: Securing Data with {websiteName}
blogs.excerpt: {websiteName} uses encryption and blockchain for data security. Provenance tracking ensures authenticity of archaeological records. Our open-source code is community-audited. Researchers trust our platform for sensitive data. Explore our security features.

blogs.title: Community Contributions to {websiteName}
blogs.excerpt: {websiteName} thrives on community contributions. Researchers submit datasets and forms, reviewed for quality. Approved content enriches our database. Contributors are credited for their work. Join our global research community.
